Harry Potter lived with the Dursleys at Number Four, Privet Drive.
Vernon Dursley spotted odd cloaked figures on his way to work.
Professor McGonagall watched the street silently as she waited for Dumbledore.
Albus Dumbledore extinguished every lamp on the street using his Deluminator.
Hagrid flew over the houses on Sirius Blackâ€™s motorcycle.
Minerva McGonagall expressed concern about leaving Harry with the Dursleys.
The owl delivering the letter from Hogwarts circled above the chimney.
Harry received his first Hogwarts letter addressed to the Cupboard Under the Stairs.
Dudley Dursley screamed when more and more letters burst through the fireplace.
Uncle Vernon drove the family to a shack on a rock in the sea to escape the letters.
Hagrid burst into the shack and handed Harry a birthday cake.
The half-giant told Harry that he was a wizard and introduced him to the magical world.
Harry learned that his parents, James and Lily Potter, were murdered by Voldemort.
Hagrid bought Harry an owl from Eeylops Owl Emporium in Diagon Alley.
Griphook led Harry and Hagrid down to his vault deep under Gringotts Wizarding Bank.
Ollivander claimed that the wand chooses the wizard after Harry tried several.
The snowy owl Harry named Hedwig became his most loyal companion.
